summary: Project includes a gated login flow and protected home page; user requests a single dashboard-style menu in the main home page upper sidebar with key navigation options (Withdrawal, Withdrawal History, Admin Panel, Funds Transaction History).
architectural_notes: Main home page should include one consolidated upper-sidebar menu for primary navigation (Withdrawal, Withdrawal History, Admin Panel, Funds Transaction History).
known_issues: Menu options (Withdrawal, Withdrawal History, Admin Panel, etc.) are not currently showing; user wants them consolidated into one menu on the main home page upper sidebar.

existing_features.title: Update the main home page upper sidebar menu (the hamburger menu shown in the header on StocksHomePage) so it displays a single consolidated menu containing only these items: Dashboard, Withdrawal, Withdrawal History, Admin Panel, and Funds Transaction History.

Wire the consolidated menu items to the existing section navigation state so each item switches the visible content area accordingly: Dashboard -> home section, Withdrawal -> withdrawal section, Withdrawal History -> withdrawalHistory section, Admin Panel -> adminPanel section, Funds Transaction History -> fundsHistory section.

Update user-facing section labels/headings related to funds history so they consistently use the phrase "Funds Transaction History" anywhere this destination is shown from the menu and on the funds history section page header.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a single dashboard-style menu in the main home page upper sidebar containing: Withdrawal, Withdrawal History, Admin Panel, and Funds Transaction History

projectName: Show a single upper-sidebar menu on the main home page with dashboard navigation items
